title: Lakshmi Kada: Ruby & Diamond Floral Bangle
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
G color) and natural Burmese Rubies with excellent color saturation.
features: Intricately designed bangle featuring a prominent floral motif at the center, surrounded by delicate diamond-studded swirls. Red Rubies strategically placed to enhance the design and bring 'Sowbhagyam' (prosperity). The bangle showcases a 'bezel setting' for the diamonds and rubies, providing maximum security and a smooth, contemporary look to the traditional design.
colors: and Deep Red (Rubies). A classic South Indian color palette symbolizing wealth
occasions: and special occasions like anniversaries or milestone celebrations. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for modern cocktail parties and formal events.
description: This Lakshmi Kada embodies a perfect fusion of tradition and modern aesthetics. The intricate floral design represents the Goddess Lakshmi, bestowing blessings of prosperity and abundance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the high-quality diamonds and rubies add an undeniable touch of luxury. A timeless piece that will be cherished for generations.
